MessageBox
service in module intermesh.core

Description

Use bootstrap to show alert, prompt and confirm modals

Methods

  • alert(text, title, glyphicon)

    Show an alert using a bootstrap modal.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    textstring

    The text to display

    titlestring

    The modal title

    glyphiconstring

    the css class without "glyphicon-" of the glyphicon to use.

    Returns
    object

    Returns a modal instance. See: http://angular-ui.github.io/bootstrap/#/modal

  • confirm(text, title)

    Show a confirm dialog using a bootstrap modal.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails

    The text to display

    titlestring

    The modal title

    Returns
    object

    Returns a modal instance. See: http://angular-ui.github.io/bootstrap/#/modal

  • prompt(text, title, inputType)

    Show a prompt dialog using a bootstrap modal.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails

    The text to display

    titlestring

    The modal title

    inputTypestring

    Returns
    object

    Returns a modal instance. See: http://angular-ui.github.io/bootstrap/#/modal
